metaAbout.title: About GetSafe 360 – AI Website Copilot
metaAbout.description: We’re building an AI copilot that upgrades any site in minutes. Learn our mission, team, and what drives us at the core.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Overview of your websites and analyses
dashboard.welcome_text: Here you can manage your websites, analytics, and optimizations. Add your website first or start an analysis right away.
dashboard.feature_1_desc: Keep every project in sight. Download analyses, fix reports, and progress per site.
dashboard.feature_2_desc: Use one-click, AI-powered fixes and improvements.

home.title: Meet your Website Co-Pilot
home.description: AI-driven Website Optimization for every website
home.details: We empower website owners and developers with AI-driven tools for real-time optimization, performance testing, and ongoing compliance with evolving SEO and accessibility standards. Packed with the latest technologies for the best website performance and highest possible rankings.
home.intro_left: Instantly analyze and optimize any website. SEO, performance, security, accessibility, and legal compliance included.
home.intro_right: Actionable insights. Instant optimization. Keep every website at peak performance. Get started for free!

infobox.sectionLabel: Targeted benefits for site owners and developers

owners.title: For Website Owners & Webmasters
owners.lead: Let your AI Copilot maintain and optimize your sites – without writing a single line of code.
owners.sublead: Paste your URL and watch your site level up in minutes:

items.1: Fresh, on-brand content; translate your entire site for global reach
items.2: Full SEO control with structured data (Schema), sitemaps, and metadata
items.3: Faster load times with image lazy loading
items.4: Security hardening via headers and custom scripts (XSS, DDoS)
items.5: Cost-effective UX and theme tweaks for a great experience on every device
items.6: WordPress & WooCommerce: a tailored toolbox that fixes known issues

owners.closing: Say goodbye to hours of fiddling – show off homepages you’re proud of, no coding needed!

devs.title: For Web Developers & Pros
devs.lead: Get your own web copilot and ditch the GitHub hassle – upgrade any site with zero setup.
devs.sublead: Your AI agency teammate helps you build your best work:

items.1: Automate the boring stuff, surface bugs fast
items.2: Supercharge SEO and structured data; generate XML & LLM sitemaps
items.3: UX improvements with lazy loading and script optimizations for faster delivery
items.4: Add configurable protections against common attacks (SQL injection, XSS, DDoS)
items.5: Internationalize with i18n for true global reach
items.6: Ship high-value features and redesigns your clients will love

devs.closing: Let AI handle the toil so you save hours, cut costs, and supercharge your flow – and your bottom line!

metaFaq.title: FAQ – GetSafe 360

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.lead: These basics will help you get started. We'll expand this page as new features land.

a1.part1: An AI copilot for website optimization that works with your live site – no

faq.a2: Paste your URL. We analyze SEO, performance and UX, propose changes, and help you apply them quickly.

a5.part1: Go to the homepage and paste your URL.
